messages.subject: "Forensic Engineering"
messages.msgSnippet: Cool term I hadn t heard before, but it makes sense.  I found it here: http://www.open2.net/forensic_engineering/ But don t look before asking yourself this
messages.messageBody:
Cool term I hadn't heard before, but it makes sense. I found it here:


http://www.open2.net/forensic_engineering/

But don't look before asking yourself this question:

What was the worst structural disaster in British history?

Something fell down.


There is a magazine called "Failure Magazine." Yikes! That sounds
depressing right off! But here is Failure Magazine's analysis of
the situation.

I came to these things because I was watching a DVD of David Macaulay
talking about this and that, and I want to say no more lest I give
away the answers.

I could tell you all the tie-in thoughts I've had in the past twenty
minutes, but you tell me! Let's make a collection.

Sandra
